title: REC sanctions ₹7,500 crore funding for Brookfield’s RE project in Andhra Pradesh
content: The project is being developed by Evren, a clean energy platform launched by Brookfield and Axis Energy as a joint venture

title: Delhi air quality: Haze shrouds Delhi, AQI at 316
content: As many as 28 monitoring stations recorded ‘very poor’ air quality with readings above 300, the CPCB's Sameer app showed.

title: Three men gang-rape college student near Coimbatore airport
content: The police are on the lookout for the trio who attacked the college student’s boyfriend before assaulting her

title: 35 fishermen from Tamil Nadu arrested by Sri Lankan Navy
content: The arrested fishermen allegedly crossed the International Maritime Boundary Line and were on board three mechanised boats

title: Delhi riots case hearing LIVE: Supreme Court to hear bail pleas of activists Umar Khalid, Sharjeel Imam and others
content: The Supreme Court on Friday was told that the seriousness of the offence cannot be a determining factor when bail is sought on the ground of prolonged incarceration of an undertrial

title: Wild elephant captured near Kudremukh, Forest Department claims tusker killed two persons near Kerekatte in Sringeri taluk of Karnataka
content: The animal was captured close to Bhagawathi Nature Camp of Jungle Lodges near Kudremukh by a team of over 150 Forest Department staff and officials, besides five trained elephants

title: Watch: India women create history with first-ever ODI World Cup title win
content: Led by Harmanpreet Kaur, with standout performances from Deepti Sharma and Shafali Verma, the team ended decades of near misses. The triumph marked a defining moment for Indian women’s cricket on the world stage.

title: TGSRTC Bus accident: Telangana CM directs officials to shift injured to Hyderabad
content: Officials informed that a tipper lorry loaded with gravel, coming from the wrong route, hit the bus, as per official communication

title: Telangana accident LIVE: Death toll climbs to 20 in tipper lorry-RTC Bus collision at Chevella
content: According to a senior officer from the Cyberabad police, sixteen bodies were shifted to the Area Hospital in Chevella soon after the crash, while another body was recovered around 9 a.m.

title: ED attaches assets worth over ₹3,000 crore in money laundering case against Anil Ambani
content: The case pertains to alleged diversion and laundering of public funds raised by Reliance Home Finance Ltd. (RHFL) and Reliance Commercial Finance Ltd. (RCFL).

title: At least 17 killed in road accident in Telangana’s Chevella
content: The mishap occurred around 7.30 a.m. on the Vikarabad–Hyderabad stretch when a lorry reportedly rammed into an RTC bus while attempting to overtake a two-wheeler

title: Bihar Assembly elections: Welfare dependency or governance reform?
content: As Bihar heads into a pivotal election, voters face a stark choice between maintaining a status quo of welfare dependency or embracing transformative governance reforms. With the State grappling with the highest rate of multidimensional poverty in India, the electorate’s anticipation for change is palpable

title: Bihar Assembly election LIVE: PM Modi to address rallies in north Bihar districts of Saharsa and Katihar
content: The Opposition charge will be led by Congress general secretary Priyanka Vadra whose rallies are scheduled in Saharsa and Lakhisarai.

title: Letter written to Principal Accountant for audit of discom regulatory assets: TNERC
content: The costs incurred by power distribution companies, which are not recovered in a timely manner, lead to the regulatory assets (RA).

title: Three men gangrape class 7 girl near Kolkata; arrested, POCSO case filed
content: The incident took place on Saturday evening when the class 7 student was returning from tuition classes, the officer said

title: TMC MLA Jyotipriyo Mallick attacked by stranger; accused arrested
content: The official said the accused, aged around 30 years, had trailed Mr. Mallick, who entered his residence around 9 p.m. The youth suddenly pounced on the former Minister and punched him in his lower abdomen

title: Coastal promenade in Chellanam–Puthenthode corridor turns a hit
content: Built at a cost of around ₹344 crore and touted as Kerala’s longest, the seawall-cum-walkway is seeing growing demand for benches and lights to draw more visitors

title: CPI(ML) launches women-centric campaign in Bihar
content: It will be held in 20 constituencies where the CPI(ML) aims to foreground issues affecting women, including gender-based violence, microfinance debt, and the exploitation of scheme workers such as ASHAs and Jeevika workers

title: Coast Guard evacuates ailing seafarer
content: The Ukrainian national had been suffering from acute periumbilical pain for two days aboard the Malta-flagged vessel MT Minerva Vera

title: Cochin Port’s ₹300-cr. project to transform Willingdon Island into a major tourist destination
content: It is part of the CPA’s mission to develop a mega cruise terminal and related infrastructure, realising the port’s potential as a preferred cruise ship destination

title: Revival of Kochi Metropolitan Transport Authority in cold storage
content: While considering a PIL, a Bench comprising Chief Justice Nitin Jamdar and Justice Basant Balaji observed that KMTA has the potential to integrate multiple transport modes, enhance last-mile connectivity, rationalise fares, and frame a parking policy

title: 737 cases booked in crackdown on erring private bus operators
content: The drive, being carried out with the support of the police, was launched on October 25. On the first day, 63 cases were registered, followed by 28 on the second and 63 on the third

title: Sabha formed to unite mutts, thirumaligais under vision of Ramanuja
content: It is with great effort that they have been brought together. This organisation will act as a bridge among those who follow the Thenkalai sect within Sri. Vaishnavites, and between those from other faiths, says the organisation

title: In Bihar’s Khagaria, people want to vote for development
content: Khagaria is surrounded by seven rivers; people point out that no leader has resolved the basic issue of flooding, which has made their life difficult; it also has high rates of migration

title: PMK stays away from multi-party meet on SIR of electoral rolls despite invite to Ramadoss
content: Salem West MLA R. Arul says he did not attend the meeting so as to not seem as though the party founder is allying with the DMK

title: CBI quizzes Velusamypuram traders in Karur stampede case
content: The CBI team also visited the site of the incident on Saturday and carried out investigations for about 15 hours

title: EC must ensure strict enforcement of MCC in Bihar: D. Raja
content: The CPI chief’s statements come in the wake of the murder of Dularchand Yadav, who was a supporter of Jan Suraaj candidate Piyush Priyadarshi, in Mokama

title: Foreign diplomats visiting poll-bound Bihar as part of ‘Know BJP’ initiative
content: The visit is being conducted under the “Know BJP” initiative launched by BJP National President J.P. Nadda

title: Biography of M.S. Swaminathan released in Chennai
content: Titled The Man Who Fed India and authored by Priyambada Jayakumar, the book traces the scientist’s childhood to his eventual association with Nobel laureate Norman Borlaug, which ultimately led to the Green Revolution

title: WB BJP alleges BLOs appointed for SIR have Trinamool links
content: Party writes to Chief Electoral Officer, claims politically affiliated appointments ahead of elections

title: Hit by train, tusker dies in Odisha
content: The incident occurred around 11.50 p.m. on Saturday (November 1, 2025) when the Shalimaar-Baripada Express train crossed the Jugal railway station

title: Maharashtra doctors stage protests demanding speedy probe into Phaltan suicide
content: The 28-year-old medical officer posted at the Phaltan Sub-District Hospital in Satara, who hailed from Beed district, was found dead in a hotel room on October 22, leaving a note naming a police official and two others for harassment

title: Push for Ramsar site tag for wetlands in Assam wildlife sanctuary
content: The Rowmari-Donduwa wetland complex in the Kaziranga-Orang landscape has been recording more birds than the only two Ramsar Sites in the northeast – Assam’s Deepor Beel and Manipur’s Loktak Lake

title: Woman Maoist surrenders in Madhya Pradesh’s Balaghat, first since State’s new rehabilitation policy
content: Sunita, from Chhattisgarh, was a bodyguard to a senior Maoist leader and carried a reward of ₹14 lakh on her head; she led the police to her forest hideout to recover arms and ammunition

title: Trinamool links migrant worker’s death to SIR; Opposition accuses party of stoking panic
content: Trinamool alleges Special Intensive Revision drove fear and despair; BJP, Congress and CPI(M) call the charge politicisation

title: SIR is a trick to drop genuine voters from the rolls, says Tamil Nadu Chief Minister Stalin
content: The exercise, which deprived people of their voting rights in Bihar, is being introduced in States including Tamil Nadu. It is the need of the hour to express objections to it, he says at a multi-party meeting held in Chennai

title: Sources: QB Daniels suffered dislocated elbow
content: Jayden Daniels suffered a dislocated left elbow on a fourth-quarter sack, sources told ESPN's Adam Schefter.

title: Little drills record 68-yard FG, sparking Jags in win
content: Jacksonville Jaguars kicker Cam Little hit an NFL-record 68-yard field goal as time expired in the first half against the Las Vegas Raiders at Allegiant Stadium.

title: Bears thrilled, Bengals 'sick' after wild shootout
content: After the Bengals scored two touchdowns in a 49-second span to erase Chicago's 14-point lead, the Bears pulled off their fifth win of the season when Caleb Williams delivered a 58-yard touchdown to rookie Colston Loveland with 17 seconds remaining.

title: Cubs earn major-league-high 3 Gold Glove awards
content: The Cubs had a major-league-high three Gold Glove winners this year, with Pete Crow-Armstrong, Ian Happ and Nico Hoerner taking home the honor.

title: Knicks' Hart dealing with nerve injury in hand
content: Josh Hart admitted to dealing with a nerve issue in his shooting hand but said he's pressing forward after a season-best performance in the Knicks' win Sunday.

title: Harper (calf) exits Spurs' first loss in walking boot
content: No. 2 pick Dylan Harper sustained a calf injury defending a dunk in the second quarter of the Spurs' loss to the Suns on Sunday night.

title: Morris claps back, says Patriots simulated snap
content: Falcons coach Raheem Morris said the Patriots defense simulated his team's snap on a key fourth-quarter play by clapping, leading to an intentional grounding penalty.

title: Henley plays on for Chargers after brother killed
content: Daiyan Henley played for the Chargers two days after his brother was shot and killed in Los Angeles. He had a sack, a pass deflection and seven tackles in the win over the Titans, later saying: "As traumatizing as all this is, I got a job to do."

title: D Schaefer, 18, authors historic multigoal game
content: New York's Matthew Schaefer, 18, added yet another milestone to his fast start with the Islanders on Sunday night, scoring two goals in a 3-2 victory over the Columbus Blue Jackets, to become the youngest defenseman in NHL history with a multigoal game.

title: Darnold dazzles, wild upsets, and Daniels' injury: Here's what to know from Week 9, including our main takeaways
content: Our NFL Nation reporters answer the biggest questions from each game. Here's what we learned from Week 9.

title: Hugh Freeze out at Auburn: Top candidates, transfers and recruits
content: After less than three seasons, they need a new coach on the Plains. Here's what could come next at Auburn.

title: T-minus two days until NFL trade deadline: Graziano has the latest intel you need to know
content: Could the Pats add an RB? Will the Dolphins unload players? Is Kirk Cousins staying put? Here's the latest on Tuesday's trade deadline from around the NFL.

title: Our trade grades: Did the Eagles fix their CB situation with Alexander, Carter?
content: Grading deals leading into the trade deadline, including Philly adding Michael Carter II and Jaire Alexander.

title: 17 men's college basketball teams that could win 30 games in 2025-26
content: History says a 30-win season could lead to a national title (see: Florida). Which teams could achieve the feat this season?

title: Kyle Larson wins NASCAR championship, denies Denny Hamlin
content: Kyle Larson denied Denny Hamlin his first career championship when a late caution at Phoenix Raceway sent title-deciding finale into overtime.

title: Week 9 winners and losers: Bowers and McCaffrey shine, Taylor and Gibbs fizzle
content: Brock Bowers, Christian McCaffrey and Caleb Williams led the way with big Week 9 performances, while Jonathan Taylor, Jahmyr Gibbs and Patrick Mahomes were among the biggest disappointments.

title: Brian Schottenheimer's role in Matt Eberflus' defense; Kyler Murray back home in Texas
content: Cowboys' HC is helping the struggling D, while the Cardinals QB hopes to play at AT&T Stadium, where he's 8-0.

title: Inside the night the Dodgers became back-to-back World Series champs -- and Yamamoto became an L.A. legend
content: After seven games, plenty of extra innings, and a history-making pitching turn, the first repeat champions of this century could finally exhale.

title: If Man City are going to win the Premier League, all roads lead to Haaland
content: Every team needs a striker to be in top form, and if Manchester City are going to win the Premier League, they will need to get the best out of Erling Haaland.

title: Way-too-early 2026 MLB Power Rankings: Are the Dodgers or Blue Jays No. 1?
content: Los Angeles just won the 2025 World Series -- and we're already looking ahead to next year. Where does your favorite team fall?

title: Open champion Miyu Yamashita wins Malaysia event
content: Women's Open winner Miyu Yamashita of Japan won the LPGA's Maybank Championship in a three-way playoff.

title: Draft risers, questions and notes: Sizing up LaNorris Sellers' great traits vs. lack of production
content: Is Sellers still a first-rounder? How does Carnell Tate rate against recent OSU receivers? We have NFL draft notes through CFB Week 10.

title: Saturday Night's Main Event takeaways: Has Jey Uso's time to claim the World Heavyweight title passed?
content: CM Punk and Jade Cargill are now WWE champions. Andreas Hale and Arda Ocal recap the four title matches on WWE Saturday Night's Main Event.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Man United eye loan deal for Real Madrid's Endrick
content: Real Madrid's Endrick is a loan target for Premier League rivals Manchester United and Aston Villa. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: Barring an MP, Leh in Ladakh has no elected representatives since October 31
content: The five-year term of the hill council came to an end on October 31 and fresh elections may be held only after talks between civil society groups and Ministry of Home Affairs take a decisive turn

title: Rajasthan bus accident: At least 15 killed as tempo traveller rams truck in Rajasthan
content: All the deceased were residents of Sursagar in Jodhpur, who were returning after visiting a temple in Bikaner district’s Kolayat; PM Modi announces ex-gratia of ₹2 lakh to the families of those dead and ₹50,000 to the injured

title: Research unearths Thiruvananthapuram Observatory’s 162-year chronicle of magnetic equator
content: Research paper chronicles the observatory’s contributions to mapping the magnetic equator in India and tracking its gradual southward migration toward Sri Lanka

title: Ending household poverty to be key to LDF’s campaign for local body polls
content: LDF convener says ruling coalition has finalised its seat sharing and set its local body electioneering in motion

title: From PILs to name-calling: How Bengaluru tunnel road project became a political battlefield
content: Though the tunnel road plan was unveiled over a year ago, the BJP staged its first full-fledged protest only on Sunday, under the slogan ‘Save Lalbagh, Protect Bengaluru’

title: Karnataka planning to set up permanent water commission on the lines of Central Water Commission
content: The proposed commission that comprises experts will recommend measures to the State government on water security and on matters of water disputes

title: Contract lecturers seek regularisation, pending salaries
content: Contract lecturers in Andhra Pradesh requested the Chief Minister to resume the regularisation process and make the contract lecturers working in government junior, degree and polytechnic colleges permanent

title: A year since his death, uncertainty surrounds M.M. Lawrence’s body
content: After his death, the body was handed over to Government Medical College, Ernakulam, for medical studies. But his daughters challenged the decision, seeking burial under Christian rites

title: PM Modi to inaugurate Emerging Science and Technology Innovation Conclave
content: Prime Minister to launch ₹1 lakh crore fund to boost private sector-led research and development ecosystem

title: Kerala Police launch mobile app to keep workers in Sabarimala under surveillance
content: App enables police to trace the identity of every worker using their name, Aadhaar number, or phone number. Over 5,200 workers have been added to the database. Earlier, lack of data used to make it difficult for the police to trace individuals with criminal backgrounds.

title: Tripura police deny permission for Tipra Motha-linked rally in Agartala
content: Authorities cite safety and crowd management concerns as reason for refusal; recent violence in several districts reviewed before decision

title: LDF to seek speedy legal steps for staying SIR in crucial election year in Kerala
content: LDF convener says EC has shown political bias by disregarding a unanimous resolution passed by the Kerala Assembly against SIR, while giving reprieve to Maharashtra and Assam

title: Ex same-sex couple’s legal battle tests India’s gender and marriage law
content: A gender dysphoric petitioner seeks to quash FIRs filed by her estranged female partner, raising questions over whether offences premised on ‘husband-wife’ roles can apply to same-sex couples

title: Kerala to actively explore potential of seaweed cultivation
content: State Fisheries department has announced plans to promote seaweed aquaculture and export-oriented industries

title: Mahayuti will win Maharashtra local polls due to good governance, relief measures: Shinde
content: The Deputy CM cites ₹32,000-crore relief package for farmers, ₹120-crore pollution plan as evidence of the ruling alliance focus on development; comes a day after united Opposition protest on voter’s list irregularities

title: Mohanlal’s possession of ivory artefacts may result in another wildlife crime case
content: Case booked against actor was only for possession of elephant tusks. Forest dept. can append the case of artefacts to the ivory if it came into his possession in a single transaction. The High Court recently struck down the ownership certificates issued to both tusks and artefacts

title: Two desi lads in Silicon Valley become youngest self-made billionaires at 22
content: Three 22-year-old friends, including Indian-Americans Adarsh Hiremath and Surya Midha, have become the world's youngest self-made billionaires. Their AI recruiting platform, Mercor, secured $350 million in funding, valuing the company at $10 billion.  This Silicon Valley startup, born from high school debate skills, now serves major AI labs and tech giants.

title: Wonder Women! A look at India’s 2025 World Cup heroes
content: India's women cricketers achieved a remarkable feat at the 2025 ODI World Cup. They showcased resilience and collective resolve throughout the tournament. Key players delivered outstanding performances, including record-breaking chases and dramatic comebacks. This campaign promises to redefine the future of Indian women's cricket. The team's journey captivated the nation.

title: 20 dead, several injured as tipper truck collides with RTC bus on Hyderabad-Bijapur highway
content: A devastating road accident in Telangana's Rangareddy district claimed at least 20 lives when a gravel-laden truck collided head-on with an RTC bus. The collision occurred near Mirzaguda, with the truck's load of gravel falling onto passengers. Authorities are investigating the cause, while the Chief Minister has ordered immediate relief and medical attention for the injured.

title: 'Have enough nukes to ... ': Nuclear testing, Mamdani & more — 10 things Trump told '60 Minutes'
content: President Trump, in a candid interview, asserted that Russia and China are secretly testing nuclear weapons. He also claimed credit for preventing a nuclear conflict between India and Pakistan, and defended his administration's tough stance on immigration and Iran's nuclear ambitions. Trump squarely blamed Democrats for the ongoing government shutdown.

title: At the stroke of midnight, India awake as World Champions!
content: Outclassing South Africa by 52 runs in the final of the 2025 Women’s ODI World Cup at the DY Patil Stadium on Sunday night, with 45,000 fans cheering them, India finally put an end to their long wait for an elusive World Cup crown. A billion hearts can now celebrate the Women in Blue’s memorable, historic, game-changing triumph for women’s cricket in India for a long time to come — courtesy of a player who wasn’t even in the reserves!

title: 'Stop pursuing projects that …': Microsoft AI chief's message to developers
content: Microsoft AI chief Mustafa Suleyman urges developers to abandon research into AI consciousness, stating only biological beings possess this trait. He emphasizes that AI simulates experience and suffering, but does not truly feel it, drawing a distinction from biological beings who have pain networks and preferences. Suleyman believes pursuing AI consciousness is a misplaced and absurd endeavor.

title: Victory parade after Women's World Cup win? Here's what we know so far
content: The BCCI has not yet planned a victory parade for the women's cricket team's World Cup win. Secretary Devajit Saikia stated that plans will be made upon the return of senior officials from ICC meetings in Dubai. The board will also address the missing Asia Cup trophy.

title: Trump warns of economic collapse: What if US Supreme Court strikes down tariffs?
content: President Trump warns of severe economic fallout if the Supreme Court overturns his tariff policy. He claims tariffs have fueled record stock market highs and 401(k) growth. The upcoming Supreme Court case challenges his authority to impose these taxes, which have generated billions in revenue, potentially requiring repayment if ruled unlawful.

title: Consumed by AI: Sam Altman admits OpenAI is consuming him; says it's ‘a little sad’
content: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman expressed envy for today's young entrepreneurs, particularly college dropouts, citing the vast opportunities and advanced AI tools that enable rapid product development.  He also reflected on the personal cost of leading OpenAI, admitting the company consumes his mental space, preventing him from pursuing new startup ideas.

title: Peak Bengaluru moment: Man spotted wearing frying pan instead of helmet - watch
content: A pillion rider in Bengaluru was filmed using a frying pan as a helmet to avoid a traffic challan. While the incident sparked amusement online, it also highlighted serious concerns about road safety and the importance of proper protective gear. The video serves as a stark reminder that such stunts are dangerous and not worth the risk of head injury.

title: PM Modi inaugrates ESTIC, launches Rs 1 lakh-cr fund to boost R&D investment
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi inaugurated ESTIC 2025, launching a Rs 1 lakh-crore RDI Scheme Fund to boost private sector R&D and announcing the Anusandhan Research Foundation. The event, featuring over 3,000 participants, aims to foster innovation across 11 thematic areas, highlighting India's growing role as a technology pioneer.

title: Your zodiac sign is 2,000 years out of date
content: Your zodiac sign may be inaccurate. Ancient astronomers based signs on constellations. Earth's wobble has shifted these star patterns over 2,000 years. Today, Western astrology uses seasonal signs, not star positions. Indian astrology aligns with star movements. Astronomy and astrology separated long ago. Belief in astrology persists due to its adaptability.

title: Musk, Rogan talk about alien object aiming at Earth that Harvard scientist say 'isn't natural'
content: Unauthorized SpaceX Starshield transmissions coincide with intense scrutiny of Comet 3I/ATLAS, an interstellar object exhibiting anomalous characteristics. Discussions on The Joe Rogan Experience podcast, featuring Elon Musk, explored potential alien probes and the Tunguska Event, fueled by astrophysicist Avi Loeb's claims of extraterrestrial origins for the comet.

title: This city has no cars, no pollution, clean water — and even solar-powered bins
content: Freiburg, Germany, showcases a sustainable urban future with its widespread solar energy, car-free mobility, and integrated green culture. This university city prioritizes cycling and public transport, featuring energy-efficient homes and community involvement. Freiburg offers a compelling model for cities worldwide, proving that ecological living enhances quality of life and fosters happier societies.

title: Shafali Verma reveals how Sachin Tendulkar inspired her World Cup heroics
content: Shafali Verma, at 21, became the youngest Player of the Match in a World Cup semi-final or final with her 87 runs and two wickets. Her performance powered India to their maiden ICC Women's World Cup title, defeating South Africa by 52 runs and marking a historic victory.

title: JEE Main 2026: NTA confirms calculators not allowed; clarifies typo error
content: The National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified that a virtual calculator will not be available for JEE Main 2026. An earlier mention in the Information Bulletin was a typographical error from a generic template. The NTA has uploaded a revised bulletin and expressed regret for any inconvenience caused to candidates.

title: 'Need more govt assistance': Hopes & hardships echo at PM Modi's Bihar rally; mixed opinions in Ara
content: Women at Prime Minister Modi's rally in Ara voiced mixed opinions, appreciating free ration but seeking more assistance and highlighting local corruption. While some praised Nitish-Modi's work, others, like a tea shop owner, stressed the urgent need for youth employment, with a trader noting improved security but also migration concerns.

title: The journey of belief: How India’s women kept the fire burning
content: A century-long dream culminated as India's women's cricket team reached the 2025 World Cup final, a testament to growing conviction and talent. This journey, from compulsory cricket in 1913 to a home-ground final, signifies a nation's awakening interest and the evolution of the sport from a struggle to a celebrated pursuit.

title: US government shutdown impact: Airports reel under travel chaos
content: Widespread flight delays and cancellations plagued US airports as the government shutdown, now the longest in history, entered its second month. Air traffic controllers and TSA officers are working without pay, leading to stress and fatigue, while airlines and unions urge Congress to pass a funding bill to end the crisis.

title: Brittany Mahomes slams “disgusting” Bills fan stunt ahead of Chiefs vs Bills
content: Ahead of the Chiefs-Bills game, a past incident involving Brittany Mahomes and a fan display in Buffalo has resurfaced. She publicly condemned a disrespectful Kermit the Frog puppet mocking Patrick Mahomes, urging for basic decency. This reminder of respect underscores the intense rivalry, proving that even amidst fierce competition, human dignity remains paramount.

title: Spirit of Champions! Indian players console heartbroken South Africans - watch
content: India's maiden ICC Women's World Cup 2025 victory in Navi Mumbai was marked by exceptional sportsmanship. Following their win over South Africa, Indian players displayed remarkable empathy, consoling their tearful opponents. Moments of compassion between teammates and rivals, like Jemimah Rodrigues comforting Marizanne Kapp and Smriti Mandhana speaking with Laura Wolvaardt, truly defined the spirit of cricket.

title: Trump’s nuclear push stirs confusion: Tests to include explosions? What energy secretary said
content: US President Trump's order for nuclear weapons system tests sparked global concern about a return to nuclear explosions. Energy Secretary Chris Wright clarified these are non-nuclear system tests, not detonations, aimed at modernizing the arsenal. This follows Trump's statement about resuming testing on an equal basis with other nations, despite a decades-long moratorium.

title: 'We are the champions!': Harmanpreet's leap & India's glory – watch winning moment
content: India has been crowned Women's World Champions after a thrilling victory at the DY Patil Stadium. Captain Harmanpreet Kaur's spectacular catch sealed the win, sparking jubilant celebrations. Shafali Verma's 87 and Deepti Sharma's all-round performance were pivotal in securing the historic triumph, marking a new era for Indian women's cricket.

title: Stock market today: Nifty50 opens in red; BSE Sensex down over 200 points
content: Stock market today: Nifty50 and BSE Sensex, the Indian equity benchmark indices, opened in red on Monday on weak global cues. While Nifty50 was below 25,700, BSE Sensex was down over 200 points.

title: India win World Cup: 'Champions of the World!' - Mithali Raj pens an emotional tribute
content: India's women's cricket team achieved a historic first, clinching the ICC Women's World Cup by defeating South Africa. Legendary former captain Mithali Raj expressed profound emotion, seeing her decades-long dream realized. The team's remarkable comeback journey, culminating in a dominant final performance, fulfilled the aspirations of generations of players and fans alike.

title: Trump says US will back Netanyahu in his criminal trial, calls charges 'unfair'
content: Former US President Donald Trump declared Washington's intention to intervene in Benjamin Netanyahu's criminal trial, deeming it "very unfair." Trump, who has previously criticized the charges against the Israeli Prime Minister, also asserted he could swiftly compel Hamas to disarm or face elimination, while praising Netanyahu as the right leader for Israel during wartime.

title: Bengaluru ambulance turns killer: Beacon and siren led to death of couple dead, 2 injured
content: A speeding ambulance, reportedly without a patient, ran a red light at Kengal Hanumanthaiah Junction, colliding with two motorbikes. The tragic accident resulted in the deaths of a couple and grievous injuries to two others. The ambulance driver, who fled the scene, has since been arrested.

title: 'Cameras analyzing my every move but...' Erika Kirk amid row over viral hug with JD Vance
content: Erika Kirk received a huge backlash for what commentators said was a lack of mourning period for her husband, as she jumped straight into work as she took up the new role as the CEO of TPUSA. Her hug to JD Vance went viral and so did her words as she said there were similarities between Charlie and JD.

title: India win WC: 'For every Nov 19, there’s Nov 2' - Harmanpreet's team healed a nation's heartbreak
content: India's women's cricket team achieved a historic triumph, securing their maiden ICC Women's World Cup title on November 2, 2025. Led by Harmanpreet Kaur, the team avenged the men's 2023 final defeat with a dominant performance against South Africa. Shafali Verma and Deepti Sharma shone, inspiring a nation and igniting a new era for women's cricket.

title: Top stocks to buy: Stock recommendations for this week - check list
content: Stock market recommendations: Motilal Oswal Financial Services highlights TVS Motor Company and M&M Financials as top stock picks for the week of November 3, 2025. TVS Motor shows strong momentum with a robust product pipeline and premiumization strategy. M&M Financials reported a strong second quarter.

title: Rajasthan highway crash: Phalodi accident kills 15 pilgrims
content: Tragedy struck near Jodhpur as a tempo traveller carrying pilgrims collided with a stationary trailer truck, claiming 15 lives, including four children and ten women. The devastating accident occurred on the Bharatmala Highway near Matoda village. Injured individuals were swiftly transported to Jodhpur for medical attention.

title: Married man stabs lover to death in Bengaluru's Pillanna Garden
content: A 35-year-old divorced woman, Renuka, was allegedly stabbed to death by her alleged lover, Ambedkar alias Kutti, 50, in Bengaluru's Pillanna Garden. The incident occurred Friday night after an argument on the road, resulting in multiple stab wounds. Kutti, who claimed to be in a relationship with the victim, was apprehended by police on Saturday.

title: The Amol Muzumdar story: Never played for India — now coach of WC-winning team
content: Amol Muzumdar, a domestic cricket legend who never played for India, has achieved a poetic full circle. After a stellar 21-year playing career, he now coaches India's women's team to their maiden ODI World Cup triumph, calling it a "watershed moment" for Indian cricket.

title: Kash Patel 'fires' official amid row over his visit to girlfriend
content: FBI Director Kash Patel reportedly became enraged after a supervisor of the agency's aviation units, Steven Palmer, was allegedly told to resign due to controversy surrounding Patel's personal travel.  The controversy stemmed from Patel's use of an agency jet to attend his girlfriend's performance, a trip questioned by a former FBI agent.

title: Taylor Swift fears for her safety as Travis Kelce focuses on new season
content: Taylor Swift is reportedly concerned about her security and privacy, wanting to avoid excessive media attention during Kansas City Chiefs games. While not asking for broadcasts to stop, she desires to maintain a lower profile. Meanwhile, Travis Kelce praised Swift's latest album, "The Life of a Showgirl," on his podcast, highlighting its success.

title: Shane Bieber’s wife reacts to Alejandro Kirk’s wife’s viral World Series post
content: Blue Jays catcher Alejandro Kirk's stellar World Series performance is matched by the heartwarming social media buzz surrounding his wife, Sofia Castaneda. A simple emoji comment from Shane Bieber's wife, Kara, on Sofia's post celebrating Kirk's success ignited a viral moment, highlighting the strong camaraderie among the team's families and captivating fans.

title: Stefon Diggs’ alleged K’yanna Barber affair escalates as Cardi B expects baby
content: Rapper Cardi B is reportedly expecting twins with NFL player Stefon Diggs, but the couple faces controversy. Diggs is also accused of fathering twins with another woman, K’yanna Barber, a situation neither party has publicly addressed. This alleged infidelity has caused fan uproar as Cardi B continues to share her pregnancy publicly.

title: How diabetes and hypertension together harm your kidneys: The hidden link
content: Diabetes, kidney disease, and high blood pressure are interconnected, silently damaging vital organs and increasing the risk of heart failure or stroke. High blood sugar harms blood vessels, leading to kidney damage and elevated blood pressure, which further worsens kidney function. Understanding this dangerous trio is essential for early detection, prevention, and effective management.

title: Tucker Kraft suffers knee injury as Packers fear torn ACL after Panthers game
content: Green Bay Packers' tight end Tucker Kraft suffered a severe knee injury during the game against the Carolina Panthers, potentially ending his season. Coach Matt LaFleur expressed grave concerns, with fears of an ACL tear confirmed by NFL insiders. This significant blow forces the Packers to rely on younger players like Luke Musgrave to fill the void.

title: ‘Haven’t gone far enough’: Trump defends ICE raids in CBS interview
content: President Trump defended ICE raids in a "60 Minutes" interview, stating they "haven't gone far enough" and blaming "liberal judges" for hindering operations. He also commented on the New York mayoral race, calling a candidate "communist" and "far worse than a socialist."

title: Prince Andrew–Epstein episode: What Trump said after King Charles stripped him of titles
content: Donald Trump expressed sympathy for the UK royal family following Prince Andrew's removal of titles, calling the situation "tragic." Meanwhile, US congressional committee members are intensifying calls for Andrew to testify about his links to Jeffrey Epstein, with one congressman suggesting a subpoena if necessary.

title: Tears of pride! Rohit Sharma gets emotional after India women’s World Cup win - Watch
content: Indian cricket witnessed a historic moment as the Women in Blue secured their maiden ICC Women's World Cup title. Amidst nationwide celebrations, a poignant scene unfolded with Rohit Sharma, India's top ODI batter, visibly moved and fighting back tears as the team achieved this monumental victory, symbolizing unity and shared pride in Indian cricket.

title: Sundar Pichai, Satya Nadella hail India's historic Women's World Cup triumph
content: India's historic maiden ICC Women's World Cup victory over South Africa ignited nationwide celebrations, drawing praise from tech giants Sundar Pichai and Satya Nadella.  This monumental win, ending decades of near-misses, has ushered in a new era for women's cricket, inspiring a generation and marking a significant milestone for the sport.

title: Women's WC: Rs 51 crore windfall! BCCI announces historic reward for Indian team
content: The BCCI has announced a record Rs 51 crore cash reward for the Indian women's cricket team following their ICC Women's World Cup 2025 victory. This significant prize money, alongside the ICC's USD 4.48 million, celebrates a historic triumph that is set to transform women's cricket in India and inspire future generations.

title: Pure Joy! Pratika’s wheelchair dance with Jemimah and Harman steals hearts after India’s win - Watch
content: Despite being sidelined by an ankle injury, opener Pratika Rawal witnessed her teammates secure India's first Women's World Cup title.  In a wheelchair, she shared in the emotional victory, her presence a testament to the team's unity.  Her replacement, Shafali Verma, starred in the final, contributing to India's historic win.

title: Jennifer Aniston wishes her boyfriend Jim Curtis a happy birthday
content: Jennifer Aniston has publicly acknowledged her relationship with author and hypnotherapist Jim Curtis via a heartwarming Instagram post.  The couple, first linked in July 2025, are reportedly enjoying a relaxed, grounded connection.  Sources suggest Curtis brings a calming influence to Aniston's life, and fans are embracing this seemingly genuine and balanced new chapter.

title: The Fodder Scam Of The 1990s: When Corruption Brought Down Bihar's Strongman Lalu Yadav
content: The government funds meant for cattle fodder and livestock were allegedly siphoned off through fake bills by politicians, bureaucrats, and suppliers.

title: Trump Refuses To Give Nvidia's Blackwell Chip To "Other People"
content: Questions have swirled about whether Trump would allow shipments of a version of the Blackwell to China since August, when he suggested he might allow sales of a scaled-down version of Nvidia's next-generation advanced GPU chip in China.

title: Jagan Reddy's Party Leader Arrested In Toxic Liquor Case, Sparks War Of Words
content: Ramesh was arrested by a joint team of the Excise department, SIT, and local police on Sunday and produced in court in the late evening.

title: "Tragic Situation": Trump On Andrew Losing Royal Titles Over Epstein Ties
content: Buckingham Palace made the announcement last week, leaving Andrew to now be known as Andrew Mountbatten Windsor.

title: Trump The Great? US President Steps Up Power Moves
content: Trump has accelerated power moves, taking revenge on his political opponents, sending more troops into more US cities, muzzling the media and asserting control over every lever of government.

title: How End Of Federal Food Aid Could Hit Black Americans
content: Two federal judges ruled nearly simultaneously on Friday that President Donald Trump's administration must continue to fund SNAP, the nation's biggest food aid programme, using contingency funds during the government shutdown

title: "Have Enough Nukes To Blow Up World 150 Times": Trump On Denuclearisation Talks With China
content: The Republican claimed the US was "doing very well against China" but acknowledged that Beijing has a "power" of rare earth minerals over Washington.

title: Arunachal Police Warn X User Over Fake Video Post On Army Casualties
content: The police in Arunachal Pradesh have warned against spreading disinformation after an X user made a fake post about Indian Army casualties in a gunfight with insurgents.

title: Bihar Man Found Dead Inside Car Parked Near Delhi Railway Station
content: The body of a 28-year-old man was found in the backseat of a railway engineer's car near the Anand Vihar station here, with police saying the Bihar native died of asphyxiation after getting locked in the vehicle.

title: Explained: Why Is Afghanistan Prone To Earthquakes
content: Eastern and northeastern Afghanistan, especially regions along its borders with Uzbekistan, Tajikistan, and Pakistan, are particularly prone to earthquakes.

title: "No, Not Really": Trump On Plans To Sell Tomahawks To Ukraine
content: US President Donald Trump said on Sunday that, for now, he is not considering a deal that would allow Ukraine to obtain long-range Tomahawk missiles for use against Russia.

title: "Hezbollah Playing With Fire": Israel As It Warns Of Intensifying Attacks
content: Israel on Sunday signalled it could intensify operations in Lebanon against Hezbollah, which Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu accused of rearming, urging Beirut to disarm the Iran-backed group.

title: Trump Seeks To 'Weaponise Hunger' In Shutdown: Top Democrat
content: A top US congressional Democrat on Sunday accused President Donald Trump and fellow Republicans of choosing to "weaponize hunger," as a prolonged government shutdown disrupts critical food benefits for millions of low-income Americans.

title: Fearing Children's Safety, US Woman Kills Escaped Virus-Carrying Monkey
content: One of the monkeys that escaped last week after a truck overturned on a Mississippi roadway was shot and killed early Sunday by a woman who says she feared for the safety of her children.

title: Inequality Making World More Prone To Pandemics: UN Report
content: The report called on world leaders to increase pandemic preparedness by investing in "social protection mechanisms" within their countries while also tackling global inequality, including through debt restructuring for developing countries.

title: Supreme Court May Redefine Trump's Favourite Foreign Policy Tool - Tariffs
content: President Donald Trump sees tariffs - or the threat of them - as a powerful tool to bend nations to his will.

title: Is US Planning Nuclear Explosions Under New Plan? What Team Trump Said
content: US President Donald Trump recently ordered new tests of the American nuclear weapons system. However, US Energy Secretary Chris Wright has clarified that the testing will not involve nuclear explosions at this time.

title: 7 Killed, 150 Injured As 6.3-Magnitude Earthquake Hits Afghanistan
content: A 6.3-magnitude earthquake struck near the northern Afghan city of Mazar-e Sharif early on Monday, killing at least seven people and injuring about 150, provincial authorities said on Monday.

title: She Is "Like My Daughter": Himachal MLA Denies Allegations Of Harassment
content: A woman in Chamba, Himachal Pradesh has accused BJP MLA Hans Raj of harassing her and threatening her family members, even as the legislator dismissed the allegations.

title: 32-Year-Old Suspect In UK Train Stabbings Boarded At Peterborough Station
content: Police arrested two British citizens on suspicion of attempted murder, but later released one after concluding that "he was not involved".

title: Every MLB team's odds to win the 2026 World Series: Dodgers open as favorites
content: The confetti has fallen on the 2025 MLB season, as the  Los Angeles Dodgers  completed a Game 7 comeback for the ages and claimed their second straight World Series championship, this time over the American League champion  Toronto Blue Jays . The star-studded Dodgers -- featuring  Shohei Ohtani  and  Mookie Betts  -- will return as the favorites to win the 2026 World Series, followed by the  New York Yankees ,  Houston Astros  and  Philadelphia Phillies . The Blue Jays open at 20-1, tied with the  Chicago Cubs  for 11th. The  Seattle Mariners , the AL runners-up, open at 14-1, while the  Milwaukee Brewers , who had the league's best record in 2025, open at 18-1. At the other end of the spectrum, the  Chicago White Sox  and  Colorado Rockies  open at 500-1. Odds as of publish time. For more, visit  ESPN BET Sportsbook.   By ESPN BET

title: AP Week 10 poll reaction: What's next for each Top 25 team
content: a wild week in the ACC with the two highest-ranked teams in the conference losing to unranked opponents . the AP top 25 is based on stats courtesy of ESPN Research . Ohio State has won nine straight games against Penn Staples .

title: As it happened: Haaland brace leads Man City, Barça top Elche
content: Another day, and more games across Europe this weekend! Sunday's action in the  Premier League  kicked off with  West Ham United  coming from a goal down to claim a much-needed  3-1  win over  Newcastle United . Then, we had  Manchester City  winning 3-1 against  Bournemouth  thanks to two goals from  Erling Haaland , and with the Cherries getting a goal from the  USMNT 's own  Tyler Adams . And in  LaLiga , we had  Barcelona  looking to bounce back from their  Clásico  loss as they beat  Elche  3-1. ( stream LIVE at 12:30 p.m. ET on ESPN+ in the U.S. ). Enjoy all of today's action from across the continent.

title: World Series champs -- again! Game 7 win cements Dodgers' dynasty
content: will Smith hits the go-ahead home run in extras as the Dodgers win their second straight world Series . the franchise closed out the Toronto Blue Jays with a 5-4 win in extra innings in Game 7 on Saturday . it was easy to think about the fourth lefty on the franchise's bullpen depth chart, a 37-year-old .
